title: Is there a way to buy winter wonder land karma skin now?
body: I just decided to become a karma main and that is the only skin I like

replies.body: Snowdown skins are [legacy content](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins), so they return to the vault unit later events or announcements make way for their return.  They are not available in the store, but you might still have a chance of finding legacy skins through mystery gifts or hextech crafting.  Let me know if that clears things up!
